body: hahaha a saw a earlier post that shows 78k people joined. so within a few seconds 10k people joined. at least try with your scam dude XD

the funny part is he keeps upping the number of people to make it seem more real. first time i saw the post it was around 20k then 40k now almost 70k. if it took 3 days to get that much people just from this site then thats sad. for one that number is unrealistic when its based off the people from this site. people come here for a quick fap from doujin not to find someone to date. this is one of the worst sites to do that kind of scam and he thinks we are dumb enough to think almost 70k people joined within 3 or so days from this site alone? ha no.
This pedophile below me actually thinks people are stupid enough to fall for his virus loaded trash. KYS Picolini
